actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1969 to prohibit the export of crude oil and petroleum products during any period when prices in the petroleum industry are subject to economic controls.

summary.text: Prohibits, under the Export Administration Act, the exportation of crude oil and petroleum products during any period when prices in the petroleum industry are subject to economic controls.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1969 to prohibit the export of crude oil and petroleum products during any period when prices in the petroleum industry are subject to economic controls.
